data.name: Fortune & Gloria Demo
data.detailed_description:
Fortune & Gloria is an action platformer where you and a friend (optional) save the day in procedurally generated missions!

Grab your trusty assault rifle, a handful of grenades, and join Nate "Fortune" Cobb and Gloria Guerrero on a mission to rescue hostages, take out the bad guys and blow stuff up!

Full version features:

  • Couch co-op action! Grab a friend, sit on the couch together and blow stuff up!
  • Singleplayer experience: switch between characters and command your AI ally to wait behind or follow you into action!
  • Procedurally generated mission levels give unlimited re-playability
  • 5 different environments, with variations within each
  • 5 enemy groups, each with 5 tiers of units to unlock and fight
  • 5 difficulty levels to match your play style, from casual to hardcore

Demo version features:

  • Singleplayer experience: switch between characters and command your AI ally to wait behind or follow you into action!
  • Procedurally generated mission levels give unlimited re-playability
  • 1 environment, with limited variations
  • 1 enemy unit from 1 enemy groups
  • 5 difficulty levels to match your play style, from casual to hardcore

Grab your trusty assault rifle, a handful of grenades, and join Nate "Fortune" Cobb and Gloria Guerrero on a mission to rescue hostages, take out the bad guys and blow stuff up!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Czech, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 512MB RAM and Webgl enabled
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 4096MB RAM and Webgl enabled
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
